objects.text:
• Stunning Ombré Turquoise Gradient Design
• Premium Quality Frosted Glass Construction
• Ergonomic Black Pump Dispenser
• Refillable For Sustainable Lifestyle

product_details.name: Eco-Luxe Gradient Glass Dispenser | Ocean Breeze Collection
product_details.description:
• Stunning ombré turquoise gradient design transitions from deep aqua to clear glass
• Premium quality frosted glass construction for elegance and durability
• Ergonomic black pump dispenser for convenient one-handed operation
• Versatile 8 oz/240ml capacity ideal for lotions, soaps, or essential oils
• Modern minimalist aesthetic perfect for bathroom or kitchen decor
• Leak-proof pump mechanism ensures clean and precise dispensing
• Refillable design supports sustainable lifestyle choices
• Easy-to-clean surface maintains its pristine appearance
• Professional-grade materials safe for various liquid formulations
• Elegant packaging suitable for gifting or personal use

banner_details:
This banner presents a stylish and eco-conscious product advertisement with a clean and modern design. Central to the layout is a prominent **product image** ("product_image") of a turquoise ombré glass dispenser with a black pump. The **heading** ("heading") features bold, dark teal serif typography to establish the brand. Beneath it, the **subheading** ("subheading") and **tagline** ("tagline") use straightforward sans-serif fonts emphasizing clarity and elegance. A short **description block** ("description") lists product features using bullet points. Eye-catching **promotional text** ("offer_text") and **urgency text** ("urgency_text") in vibrant red convey limited-time excitement. The **price** ("price") is large and prominent, while a rectangular **CTA button** ("cta_button") with “SHOP NOW” ("cta") invites immediate action. The background features layered vector borders and abstract turquoise linework for visual interest.

**Color Palette**:
- Teal: #0C5B5B, #25A0A0
- Red: #E74C3C
- White: #FFFFFF
- Gray: #333333
- Background Gradient: #25A0A0 (15% opacity) to #E0F5F5 (15% opacity)
product_color: The product image features a sleek bottle with a gradient of teal and aqua tones, transitioning from a deeper teal at the base to a lighter, almost mint shade near the top. The black pump cap adds a bold contrast, creating a refined and modern look. The shadows and reflections of teal around the base subtly enhance the color transition, while the frosted appearance softens the overall palette. Key colors include Deep Teal (#007C80), Aqua Mist (#A7E7D1), Frosted Mint (#DFF6EF), and Matte Black (#1E1E1E). These colors can be used in an ad banner to convey a fresh, clean, and premium aesthetic.
